description: Terms related to male-to-female transgender people and trans women

terms.definition: A male to female transitioner, a trans woman.
A common chosen name for transgirls, is memed within the phrase "take your pills alice!"
A usually younger transgirl who is in the process of transitioning or desires to transition, but is still "boymoding" or presenting as a boy and has not yet fully come out.

COmbined Gender Identity And Transsexuality Inventory, is a test developed by webcomic author Jennifer Diane Reitz, a transsexual woman who designed it "specifically for the uncertain pre-transitional Male-to-Female gender dysphoric".
A trans woman who spends far too much time on Discord, an online instant messaging app, to the point that she mirrors the cultural attitudes and speech patterns of the platform.
The sexual arousal induced erection that some MTF's experience due to “gender euphoria,” particularly in the earlier stages of their transition. Often associated with wearing feminine clothing.
A bottom who has the brain and general personality of a female, usually referring to that of a trans woman.

Derogatory term for a transwoman who has a large, overtly masculine build, masculine features, and is very hairy. If they were to call themselves a twink pre-transition, gay men would tell them they were more akin to a bear.
"I Will Never Be A Woman." A self-deprecating statement said by trans women about their own transition.
An MTF trans woman who is still "manmoding" or presenting as a masculine male. This term is used in contrast to boymoder, who are considered to be more youthful, effeminate, androgynous, and cute.
A male to female detransitioner. They went from M to F to M. Sometimes used to refer to fully transitioned trans women who adopt a masculine aesthetic on purpose.
The bangs that trans women often adopt into their hairstyles to hide their higher hairlines, masculine brow ridge, and widow's peaks.

A trans person who leans towards or identifies with feminine gender identity and presentation. Can be used to refer to an aesthetic, or can be used to refer to anyone AMAB that is transitioning with estrogen.
"You Will Never Be A Woman." A pejorative intended to drive trans women to despair, used by transphobes.
Hyperbolic term used to insult other transwomen, implying they might sexually assault someone.
A romantic relationship between two or more transwomen.
